description:
Provides a [ADB](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/product/92664.htm) cluster backup policy resource and used to configure cluster backup policy.

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.71.0+. 
-> Each DB cluster has a backup policy and it will be set default values when destroying the resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DbClusterId.description: The Id of cluster that can run database.

PreferredBackupPeriod.description: ADB Cluster backup period. Valid values: [Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday]. Default to ["Tuesday", "Thursday", "Saturday"].

PreferredBackupTime.description: ADB Cluster backup time, in the format of HH:mmZ- HH:mmZ. Time setting interval is one hour. Default to "02:00Z-03:00Z". China time is 8 hours behind it.
